I started tearing up before the opening credits. I love this beautiful show so damn much. #Treme

— cybernetic sarCC of xmas past from the future (@sarCCastro) December 2, 2013

If I don't watch. Then no one can die. #TheWalkingDead

Do not even ASK Rick to make a decision. If you put a restaurant menu down in front of him he will run away screaming. #TheWalkingDead

Nothing good comes from Georgia clay. #TheWalkingDead

The more I see of the apocalypse, the more I think it's not for me. #TheWalkingDead

Screw you, show. Screw you. I hate you and your children and your grandchildren. #thewalkingdead

THE WALKING DEAD DOES NOT CARE ABOUT ANY OF US!

oh, Walking Dead watchers, you'll be back. You'll always be back.

Watching THE GOOD WIFE with the customary glass of scotch because I basically am Diane Lockhart.

Hardest sequence ever to edit. A lot of worlds collided here. Reality, memory, imagination. #TheGoodWife

We wanted the sequence to get in Will's head. Use montage to place us in his mind. #TheGoodWife

— Good Wife Writers (@GoodWifeWriters) December 2, 2013

I think Will's getting teary because he's remembering how bad Alicia's bangs were. #TheGoodWife

— Emma Fraser (@frazbelina) December 2, 2013

AHHH this scene THIS SCENE. Amazing all around. Applauding @GoodWifeWriters from my couch.

This is like Vertigo. I HAVE TOO MANY FEELINGS BUT WILL IS ACTING LIKE JIMMY STEWART AND ALICIA IS KIM NOVAK.. #goodwife

If Will turns hippy crunchy into a new version of Alicia Florrick, y'all will know I'm right. #thegoodwifemeetsvertigo

Hippy crunchy chick. I was having such a good time too. #goodwife

Damn that blonde chickie on #TheGoodWife is like Bad-Wig Island on #Arrow...stops the action cold!

let's use this commercial break to gripe: TV should stop being radio, and embrace film. Because movies have stopped. #TheGoodWife

Kalinda is like Tina Turner in Private Dancer. She should have the music playing as she walks around the rooms. #goodwife

Do you want me to finish? YASSSS BITCH YASSSSSS. #goodwife

I basically want Alicia to get this money so she can spend it on a whole slew of designer dresses and statement jewelry. Obviously. #TGW

Aren't too many moments I'm just impressed and proud of Alicia. But her perching her lips just so in reaction to Will? YASS. #goodwife

And Cary? Cary is in sync with Alicia so hardcore he knew where she was going and he was gon guard for her til she touched down. #goodwife

"Sometimes I think of you as 'Mom' and other times just as this interesting person that lives in our house." #TheGoodWife, I love you so.

Poor CBS promo department. Trying to sell us on Hostages after that TGW is like asking us to chase top-shelf whiskey with a crappy TV show.

‚Äú@snorlax_08: Will Gardner, you know these popcorn hoes you dip in has NOTHING on Alicia's bomb-bomb. #TheGoodWife‚Äù
